meta.name: OpenShift
meta.description: A collection of queries for OpenShift MCP Server.
meta.note: Each entry includes a user query and its corresponding tool function name. Useful for LLM tool selection evaluation.

queries.query: What pods are running in the llama-serve namespace?
Can you delete the pod example in llama-serve namespace?
Can you fetch the logs of the pod example in the llama-serve namespace?
Create a pod with the docker.io/hello-world image and expose port 8080 in the llama-serve namespace?
What are the events in llama-serve namespace??
